snippet: Jurors in the case of the man accused of killing relatives of the Oscar winner Jennifer Hudson began deliberations on Wednesday after prosecutors insisted that “a tsunami of evidence” linked him to the crime.
abstract: Jurors begin deliberation in the case of accused murderer William Balfour; Balfour, former brother-in-law of actress and singer Jennifer Hudson, is accused of killing other members of Hudson's family.
lead_paragraph: Jurors in the case of the man accused of killing relatives of the Oscar winner Jennifer Hudson began deliberations on Wednesday after prosecutors insisted that “a tsunami of evidence” linked him to the crime.

headline.main: Illinois: Deliberations Begin in Case of Killings of Actress’s Relatives
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Deliberations Begin In Case of Killings of Actress’s Relatives
